name: Pyramidion
description:
My entry to the Ludum Dare 42 Jam, made in 72 hours over a weekend.

Use the left and right arrow keys to move. Space or up arrow key to jump. Up arrow key to enter doors. Avoid the snakes and climb to reach the top!

The hard difficulty mode is unlocked only after beating the game on normal difficulty.
